text: Hello. Have you ever heard of the organization Save the Children?
I haven't
They are an amazing organization with a national and an international presence. Would you like to know more about what they do?
I think I'm okay. No need to share more information
I understand and I do not want to take up too much of your time. But please know that this organization ehlps children on every continent but Antartica.
Why not Antartica?

There just isn't the population to warrant it. The climate is not sustainable for human life and children do not reside there. But in the other countries they provide emergency response, global advocacy,  literacy, and health education.
Well that's disappointing. What country receives the most aid?

It is spread out by need but rest assured that their charity ranges from Kentucky all the way to Kenya. Also, 86% of all expenditures go to program services so everyone that donates knows that their money is being used for a good cause rather than misappropriated.
Okay sounds interesting. How do people donate to the charity?
You can visit their website or I can assist you with donating today. Can I ask if you have ever donated to a charity before?
Yes I have in the past, but not recently
Glad to hear it. Charity is very important. Is this a charity you believe to be doing a good thing based on the information I have provided?
Sounds like a good mission, but I probably won't be able to donate
Any little bit helps. Even a dollar or less can be used to do great things. Small donations add up quickly.
Yes, I've heard that before. Like March of Dimes and the Salvation Army
How much do you like to donate to the charity now? Your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all your payment.
I would like to donate $0
I'm sorry to hear that. I hate to push but is there any chance you could give just $0.25?
No thanks. I like to keep my money for now.
I understand. You have a good day.
